testcase.name: Get book by isbn
testcase.system-out: Given I have a list of books................................................passed When I request book with isbn 'isbn:1111'...................................passed Then I should receive book with isbn 'isbn:1111'............................passed

testcase.name: Get book by isbn fails when book does not exist
testcase.system-out: Given I have a list of books................................................passed When I request book with isbn 'isbn:9999'...................................passed Then I should receive book not found........................................passed
